item.description:
Let's meet for Chinese language practice and to discuss the future of this group! Bring a friend, all levels welcome.

Ok, there's little parking in the area, but try Washington St. From the Back Bay T, walk into the South End on Clarendon; from the Silver Line, E Berkeley is closest stop.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Chinese Language January Meetup
